block.p: An article in Business Day yesterday about Inside: The Business of Entertainment, Media and Technology, a magazine to be started by Powerful Media and Standard Media International, misstated the circulation breakdown of The Industry Standard, whose back-office operations will produce and distribute the new magazine. About 45 percent of the Industry Standard's 200,000 readers receive the magazine free. Not all of them do.

An article in Business Day yesterday about Inside: The Business of Entertainment, Media and Technology, a magazine to be started by Powerful Media and Standard Media International, misstated the circulation breakdown of The Industry Standard, whose back-office operations will produce and distribute the new magazine. About 45 percent of the Industry Standard's 200,000 readers receive the magazine free. Not all of them do.
